label: VerifiableCredential
comment: A verifiable credential is a digital and verifiable version of everyday credentials such as certificates and licenses.  It conforms to the W3C Verifiable Credentials Data Model v2.0 (VCDM)

datatypeProperties.comment: A list of JSON-LD contect URIs that define the seamntic meaning of prperties within the credential.
A unique identifier (URI) assigned to the product passport.
The W3C DID of the Party that issued the verifiable credential.
The date and time from which the credential is valid.
The expiry date (if applicable) of this verifiable credential.
